TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract serializable beforefieldinit CollectionBase extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
Public MustInherit Class CollectionBase Implements IList
public ref class CollectionBase abstract : System::Collections::IList
type CollectionBase = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 提供强类型集合的 基类。

span.span: Provides the base class for a strongly typed collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 我们不建议你使用`CollectionBase`类的新的开发。We don't recommend that you use the `CollectionBase` class for new development. 相反，我们建议使用泛型类。Instead, we recommend that you use the generic class. 有关详细信息，请参阅[不应使用非泛型集合](https://github.com/dotnet/platform-compat/blob/master/docs/DE0006.md)GitHub 上。For more information, see [Non-generic collections shouldn't be used](https://github.com/dotnet/platform-compat/blob/master/docs/DE0006.md) on GitHub. 一个实例始终是可修改。A instance is always modifiable. 请参阅有关此类的只读版本。See for a read-only version of this class. 容量是元素数目可以容纳。The capacity of a is the number of elements the can hold. 元素添加到，自动增加容量通过重新分配所需的方式。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required through reallocation. 可以通过设置减少容量属性显式。The capacity can be decreased by setting the property explicitly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例实现类，并使用该实现若要创建一系列对象。The following code example implements the class and uses that implementation to create a collection of objects. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/CPP/collectionbase.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/CS/collectionbase.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/VB/collectionbase.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 公共静态 (在 Visual Basic 中) 的此类型的成员是线程安全。

span.span: Public static ( in Visual Basic) members of this type are thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 但不保证所有实例成员都是线程安全的。

span.span: Any instance members are not guaranteed to be thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 此实现不提供同步 （线程安全） 包装器，但是，派生的类可以创建他们自己的同步的版本使用属性。

span.span: This implementation does not provide a synchronized (thread safe) wrapper for a , but derived classes can create their own synchronized versions of the using the property.

threadsafe.span: 枚举整个集合本质上不是线程安全的过程。

span.span: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure.

threadsafe.span: 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。

span.span: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.

threadsafe.span: 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。

span.span: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.

para.span: 此基类提供轻松实现器来创建强类型化的自定义集合。

span.span: This base class is provided to make it easier for implementers to create a strongly typed custom collection.

para.span: 建议来扩展此基类而不是创建其自己的实施者。

span.span: Implementers are encouraged to extend this base class instead of creating their own.

related.span: 执行不区分区域性的字符串操作

span.span: Performing Culture-Insensitive String Operations

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

.method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
Protected Sub New ()
protected: CollectionBase();

summary.span: 使用默认初始容量初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the default initial capacity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 容量是元素数目的可以容纳。The capacity of a is the number of elements that the can hold. 元素添加到，自动增加容量所要求的重新分配内部数组。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array. 如果可以估计集合的大小，指定的初始容量，则无需要执行多个大小调整操作，同时将元素添加到。If the size of the collection can be estimated, specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the . 此构造函数是 o （1） 操作。This constructor is an O(1) operation.

MemberSignature.Value: protected CollectionBase (int capacity);
.method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 capacity) cil managed
Protected Sub New (capacity As Integer)
protected: CollectionBase(int capacity);
new System.Collections.CollectionBase : int -> System.Collections.CollectionBase

param.name: capacity
param.span: 新列表最初可以存储的元素数。

span.span: The number of elements that the new list can initially store.

summary.span: 使用指定的容量初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified capacity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 容量是元素数目的可以容纳。The capacity of a is the number of elements that the can hold. 元素添加到，自动增加容量所要求的重新分配内部数组。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array. 如果可以估计集合的大小，指定的初始容量，则无需要执行多个大小调整操作，同时将元素添加到。If the size of the collection can be estimated, specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the . 此构造函数是 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是`capacity`。This constructor is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is `capacity`.

MemberSignature.Value: public int Capacity { get; set; }
.property instance int32 Capacity
Public Property Capacity As Integer
public: property int Capacity { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.Capacity : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 可包含的元素数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of elements that the can contain.
The number of elements that the can contain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是的元素数的可以存储。 is the number of elements that the can store. 是中的实际的元素数目。 is the number of elements that are actually in the . 始终是大于或等于。 is always greater than or equal to . 如果超出了时添加元素，则自动通过增大容量在复制旧元素和添加新元素之前重新分配内部数组。If exceeds while adding elements, the capacity is automatically increased by reallocating the internal array before copying the old elements and adding the new elements. 可以通过设置减少容量属性显式。The capacity can be decreased by setting the property explicitly. 时的值设置了显式，内部数组还重新分配以适应指定的容量。When the value of is set explicitly, the internal array is also reallocated to accommodate the specified capacity. 检索此属性的值是 o （1） 的操作;将属性设置为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`新容量。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation; setting the property is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the new capacity.

exception.span: 已设置为一个小于 的值。

span.span: is set to a value that is less than .

exception.span: 系统上没有足够的可用内存。

span.span: There is not enough memory available on the system.

summary.span: 从 实例移除所有对象。

span.span: Removes all objects from the instance.

summary.span: 不能重写此方法。

span.span: This method cannot be overridden.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置为零。 is set to zero. 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . 若要执行自定义操作之前或之后清除集合，重写受保护或方法。To perform custom actions before or after the collection is cleared, override the protected or method.

summary.span: 返回循环访问 实例的枚举器。

span.span: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the instance.
An for the instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [Visual Basic 中， C#][Visual Basic, C#] C# 语言的 `foreach` 语句（在 Visual Basic 中为 `for each`）隐藏了枚举数的复杂性。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建议使用 `foreach`，而不是直接操作枚举数。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 枚举器可用于读取集合中的数据，但不能用于修改基础集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 最初，枚举数定位在集合中第一个元素的前面。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 也会将枚举器放回此位置。 also brings the enumerator back to this position. 在此位置，调用将引发异常。At this position, calling throws an exception. 因此，在读取 的值之前，必须调用 将枚举器向前移动到集合的第一个元素。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 在调用 或 之前， 返回同一对象。 returns the same object until either or is called. 将 设置为下一个元素。 sets to the next element. 如果越过集合，枚举器的末尾放置在集合中的最后一个元素的后面和返回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 当枚举数位于此位置上，对后续调用还返回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最后一次调用到返回`false`，则调用将引发异常。If the last call to returned `false`, calling throws an exception. 若要再次将 设置为集合的第一个元素，可以调用 并接着调用 。To set to the first element of the collection again, you can call followed by . 只要集合保持不变，枚举数就保持有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果进行了更改到集合中，例如添加、 修改或删除元素，该枚举数将失效且不可恢复，并且下次调用或引发。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to or throws an . 如果集合修改之间并，返回设置为时，该元素，即使该枚举数已经无效。If the collection is modified between and , returns the element that it is set to, even if the enumerator is already invalidated. 该枚举数不具有独占访问集合的权限；因此，枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure. 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. 虽然方法不是对默认情况下，COM 客户端可见继承类可以将其公开，并会在 COM 客户端导致意外行为。While the method is not visible to COM clients by default, inheriting the class can expose it and can cause undesirable behavior in COM clients. 此方法为 o （1） 运算。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例实现类，并使用该实现若要创建一系列对象。The following code example implements the class and uses that implementation to create a collection of objects. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/CPP/collectionbase.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/CS/collectionbase.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/VB/collectionbase.vb#1)]

summary.span: 当清除 实例的内容时执行其他自定义进程。

span.span: Performs additional custom processes when clearing the contents of the instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法的默认实现需要通过要清除的集合之前执行某些操作的派生类中重写。The default implementation of this method is intended to be overridden by a derived class to perform some action before the collection is cleared. 仅在返回的实例上调用 On \* 方法属性，但不能对返回的实例属性。The On\* methods are invoked only on the instance returned by the property, but not on the instance returned by the property. 如果该进程将失败，集合将恢复到以前的状态。If the process fails, the collection reverts back to its previous state. 此方法的默认实现是 o （1） 操作。The default implementation of this method is an O(1) operation.

para.span: 此方法允许实施必须定义从基础删除所有元素之前。

span.span: This method allows implementers to define processes that must be performed before deleting all the elements from the underlying .

para.span: 通过定义此方法，实现者可以向继承的方法添加功能，而无需重写所有其他方法。

span.span: By defining this method, implementers can add functionality to inherited methods without having to override all other methods.

para.span: 而在标准的清除行为之前调用标准清除行为之后调用。

span.span: is invoked before the standard Clear behavior, whereas is invoked after the standard Clear behavior.

para.span: 例如，实施者可以免除从通过全局清除删除某些元素。

span.span: For example, implementers can exempt certain elements from deletion by a global Clear.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法的默认实现需要通过插入指定的元素后执行某些操作的派生类中重写。The default implementation of this method is intended to be overridden by a derived class to perform some action after the specified element is inserted. 仅在返回的实例上调用 On \* 方法属性，但不能对返回的实例属性。The On\* methods are invoked only on the instance returned by the property, but not on the instance returned by the property. 如果发生下列其中一项，则集合将恢复到以前的状态：The collection reverts back to its previous state if one of the following occurs: - 该进程将失败。The process fails. - 重写此方法引发异常。This method is overridden to throw an exception. 此方法的默认实现是 o （1） 操作。The default implementation of this method is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法的默认实现需要重写由派生类中移除指定的元素之前执行一些操作。The default implementation of this method is intended to be overridden by a derived class to perform some action before the specified element is removed. 仅在返回的实例上调用 On \* 方法属性，但不能对返回的实例属性。The On\* methods are invoked only on the instance returned by the property, but not on the instance returned by the property. 如果该进程将失败，集合将恢复到以前的状态。If the process fails, the collection reverts back to its previous state. 此方法的默认实现是 o （1） 操作。The default implementation of this method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例实现类，并使用该实现若要创建一系列对象。The following code example implements the class and uses that implementation to create a collection of objects. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在由连续的元素组成的集合（如列表）中，已移除元素下面的元素将上移以占据空出的位置。In collections of contiguous elements, such as lists, the elements that follow the removed element move up to occupy the vacated spot. 如果集合具有索引，则移动的元素的索引也将更新。If the collection is indexed, the indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated. 此行为不适用于元素按概念划分为不同存储桶的集合，如哈希表。This behavior does not apply to collections where elements are conceptually grouped into buckets, such as a hash table. 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is .

is equal to or greater than .

MemberSignature.Value: bool System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized { get; }
.property instance bool System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized
ReadOnly Property IsSynchronized As Boolean Implements ICollection.IsSynchronized
property bool System::Collections::ICollection::IsSynchronized { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否同步对 的访问（线程安全）。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether access to the is synchronized (thread safe).

value.span: 如果对 的访问是同步的（线程安全），则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if access to the is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个实例不同步。A instance is not synchronized. 派生的类可以提供的同步的版本使用属性。Derived classes can provide a synchronized version of the using the property. 枚举整个集合本质上不是线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure. 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. 下面的代码示例演示如何锁定集合使用在整个枚举期间：The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the during the entire enumeration: [!code-cpp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/CPP/remarks.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/CS/remarks.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.CollectionBase#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/VB/remarks.vb#2)] 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

MemberSignature.Value: object System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot { get; }
.property instance object System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot
ReadOnly Property SyncRoot As Object Implements ICollection.SyncRoot
property System::Object ^ System::Collections::ICollection::SyncRoot { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取可用于同步对 的访问的对象。

span.span: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the .

value.span: 可用于同步对 的访问的对象。

span.span: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生的类可以提供其自己的同步的版本使用属性。Derived classes can provide their own synchronized version of the using the property. 同步代码必须在执行操作的，而不是直接在。The synchronizing code must perform operations on the of the , not directly on the . 这样可确保对从其他对象派生的集合正确地执行操作。This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects. 具体而言，它维护与其他线程可能同时对修改的正确同步对象。Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the object. 枚举整个集合本质上不是线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure. 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. 下面的代码示例演示如何锁定集合使用在整个枚举期间：The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the during the entire enumeration: [!code-cpp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/CPP/remarks.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/CS/remarks.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.CollectionBase#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/VB/remarks.vb#2)] 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已经等于容量、 通过自动重新分配内部数组并将现有元素复制到新数组，然后才能添加新元素的列表的容量加倍。If already equals the capacity, the capacity of the list is doubled by automatically reallocating the internal array and copying the existing elements to the new array before the new element is added. 如果小于容量，此方法为 o （1） 运算。If is less than the capacity, this method is an O(1) operation. 如果需要增加以容纳新元素的容量，此方法将成为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是。If the capacity needs to be increased to accommodate the new element, this method becomes an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下面的代码示例实现类，并使用该实现若要创建一系列对象。The following code example implements the class and uses that implementation to create a collection of objects. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/CPP/collectionbase.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/CS/collectionbase.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/VB/collectionbase.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法执行线性搜索;因此，此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是。This method performs a linear search; therefore, this method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . 此方法通过调用来确定相等性。This method determines equality by calling . 从.NET Framework 2.0 开始，此方法使用集合的对象并上的方法`item`来确定是否`item`存在。Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, this method uses the collection's objects' and methods on `item` to determine whether `item` exists. 在.NET Framework 的早期版本中，通过进行此判断和方法的`item`参数在集合中的对象。In the earlier versions of the .NET Framework, this determination was made by using the and methods of the `item` parameter on the objects in the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例实现类，并使用该实现若要创建一系列对象。The following code example implements the class and uses that implementation to create a collection of objects. param.span: 要在 中定位的 。

summary.span: 搜索指定的 ，并返回整个 中第一个匹配项的从零开始的索引。

span.span: Searches for the specified and returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence within the entire .

returns.span: 如果找到，则为整个 中 第一个匹配项的从零开始的索引；否则为 -1。

span.span: The zero-based index of the first occurrence of within the entire , if found; otherwise, -1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法执行线性搜索;因此，此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是。This method performs a linear search; therefore, this method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . 此方法通过调用来确定相等性。This method determines equality by calling . 从.NET Framework 2.0 开始，此方法使用集合的对象并上的方法`item`来确定是否`item`存在。Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, this method uses the collection's objects' and methods on `item` to determine whether `item` exists. 在.NET Framework 的早期版本中，通过进行此判断和方法的`item`参数在集合中的对象。In the earlier versions of the .NET Framework, this determination was made by using the and methods of the `item` parameter on the objects in the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例实现类，并使用该实现若要创建一系列对象。The following code example implements the class and uses that implementation to create a collection of objects. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/CPP/collectionbase.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/CS/collectionbase.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/VB/collectionbase.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: void IList.Insert (int index, object value);
.method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.Collections.IList.Insert(int32 index, object value) cil managed
Sub Insert (index As Integer, value As Object) Implements IList.Insert
virtual void System.Collections.IList.Insert(int index, System::Object ^ value) = System::Collections::IList::Insert;

param.name: index
param.span: 应插入 的从零开始的索引。

span.span: The zero-based index at which should be inserted.

param.name: value
param.span: 要插入的 。

span.span: The to insert.

summary.span: 将元素插入 的指定索引处。

span.span: Inserts an element into the at the specified index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已经等于容量、 通过插入新元素之前自动重新分配内部数组列表的容量加倍。If already equals the capacity, the capacity of the list is doubled by automatically reallocating the internal array before the new element is inserted. 如果`index`等同于，`value`添加到末尾。If `index` is equal to , `value` is added to the end of . 在由连续的元素组成的集合（如列表）中，插入点下面的元素将下移以容纳新的元素。In collections of contiguous elements, such as lists, the elements that follow the insertion point move down to accommodate the new element. 如果集合具有索引，则移动的元素的索引也将更新。If the collection is indexed, the indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated. 此行为不适用于元素按概念划分为不同存储桶的集合，如哈希表。This behavior does not apply to collections where elements are conceptually grouped into buckets, such as a hash table. 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下面的代码示例实现类，并使用该实现若要创建一系列对象。The following code example implements the class and uses that implementation to create a collection of objects. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/CPP/collectionbase.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/CS/collectionbase.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/VB/collectionbase.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: bool System.Collections.IList.IsFixedSize { get; }
.property instance bool System.Collections.IList.IsFixedSize
ReadOnly Property IsFixedSize As Boolean Implements IList.IsFixedSize
property bool System::Collections::IList::IsFixedSize { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示 是否具有固定大小。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the has a fixed size.

value.span: 如果 具有固定大小，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the has a fixed size; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 具有固定大小的集合在创建之后不能再添加或移除元素，但是允许修改现有元素。A collection with a fixed size does not allow the addition or removal of elements after the collection is created, but it allows the modification of existing elements. 具有固定大小的集合只是一个集合与防止添加和移除元素; 的包装器因此，如果在更改基础集合，包括添加或删除的元素，大小固定集合反映了这些更改。A collection with a fixed size is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents adding and removing elements; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, including the addition or removal of elements, the fixed-size collection reflects those changes. 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

MemberSignature.Value: bool System.Collections.IList.IsReadOnly { get; }
.property instance bool System.Collections.IList.IsReadOnly
ReadOnly Property IsReadOnly As Boolean Implements IList.IsReadOnly
property bool System::Collections::IList::IsReadOnly { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示 是否为只读。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the is read-only.

value.span: 如果 是只读的，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the is read-only; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在创建只读集合后，该集合不允许添加、移除或修改元素。A collection that is read-only does not allow the addition, removal, or modification of elements after the collection is created. 集合是只读的只是一个集合与可防止修改集合; 的包装器因此，如果对基础集合进行更改，只读集合反映了这些更改。A collection that is read-only is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents modifying the collection; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, the read-only collection reflects those changes. 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用下面的语法通过此属性访问集合中的特定元素：`myCollection[index]`。This property provides the ability to access a specific element in the collection by using the following syntax: `myCollection[index]`. 检索此属性的值是 o （1） 的操作;将属性设置也是 o （1） 操作。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation; setting the property is also an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例实现类，并使用该实现若要创建一系列对象。The following code example implements the class and uses that implementation to create a collection of objects. param.name: value
param.span: 要从 移除的 。

span.span: The to remove from the .

summary.span: 从 中移除特定对象的第一个匹配项。

span.span: Removes the first occurrence of a specific object from the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不包含指定的对象，保持不变。If the does not contain the specified object, the remains unchanged. 不引发异常。No exception is thrown. 此方法执行线性搜索;因此，此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是。This method performs a linear search; therefore, this method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . 此方法通过调用来确定相等性。This method determines equality by calling . 在由连续的元素组成的集合（如列表）中，已移除元素下面的元素将上移以占据空出的位置。In collections of contiguous elements, such as lists, the elements that follow the removed element move up to occupy the vacated spot. 如果集合具有索引，则移动的元素的索引也将更新。If the collection is indexed, the indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated. 此行为不适用于元素按概念划分为不同存储桶的集合，如哈希表。This behavior does not apply to collections where elements are conceptually grouped into buckets, such as a hash table. ## Examples 下面的代码示例实现类，并使用该实现若要创建一系列对象。The following code example implements the class and uses that implementation to create a collection of objects. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/CPP/collectionbase.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/CS/collectionbase.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/VB/collectionbase.vb#1)]
